id.sql: CREATE TABLE `travaux_v2`.`capacitys` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT ,  `id_fam` INT(10) NULL ,  `id_cap` VARCHAR(255) NULL ,  `created` DATETIME NOT NULL ,  `updated` DATETIME NOT NULL ,    PRIMARY KEY  (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;
